welcome_message_body: "Welcome to St. Francis, a charming city known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our quaint town and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at General Mitchell International Airport serves primarily Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at General Mitchell International Airport serves primarily Delta Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'MKE-Free-Wifi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim areas.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves private and charter flights, with its own designated parking area and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
